name: Office Hours
description:
Ever felt like Office hours are too long? Take matters into your own hands and end the office day early...

Shoot up the office in your own style, but don't run out of rage or else the fantasy will break.

Good Luck.

Goals:
Kill everyone with the least amount of points spent!
Advance to next level.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow Keys for movement
Mouse for rotation
C for rage mode
Click to fire

Disclaimer -> The game over was made when the game jam was over man.
